thread.title: Walmart Sees Sales Growth as Digital Investments Remain in Focus

author: Austen Hufford
title: Walmart Sees Sales Growth as Digital Investments Remain in Focus

organizations.name: digital investments remain in focus walmart inc.

text:
A strong U.S. economy and recent store improvements are helping Walmart Inc., Macyâ€™s Inc. and other big retail chains replace business lost to online rivals.
Buoyed by low unemployment and rising wages, Americans are stepping up purchases of everything from apparel to groceries to dishwashers. Meanwhile, many retailers, stung by competition from Amazon.com Inc., have closed hundreds of weaker stores, leaving them with leaner inventories and better locations.
